pullRequest.title: Add Wandering Trader spawn rate config options
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds config options for adjusting Wandering Trader spawn rates to paper.yml.

wanderingTraderSpawnMinuteTicks: how long should a "minute" be for the spawning logic. Vanilla = 1200 ticks
wanderingTraderSpawnDayTicks: how long should a "day" be for the spawning logic. Vanilla = 24000 ticks
wanderingTraderSpawnChanceMin: the minimum/starting spawn chance
wanderingTraderSpawnChanceMax: the maximum spawn chance
wanderingTraderSpawnChanceFailureIncrement: how much to increment the spawn chance on a failed attempt

These values are all easy to understand after a quick read of this page on the Minecraft wiki: https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Wandering_Trader#Spawning

nodes.bodyText: Do no remove fields, this breaks plugins relying on nms
Please don't comment code out, just remove it as commenting increases the diff

beforeCommit.message:
Add Wandering Trader spawn rate config options

Removes usages of the Vanilla wanderingTraderSpawnDelay and wanderingTraderSpawnChance values from the level.dat.
These were only used in some places, with hardcoded values in others (there are reports online of odd behaviour which match this).
This patch also simplifies the spawn delay logic and allows for arbitrary tick delays set in the Paper world config
(vanilla 24000 / 20 mins / 1 mc day), as well as adds config options for the minimum spawn chance, maximum spawn chance, and the
spawn chance increment on failed spawn attempts. These values are all easy to grasp and configure after a quick glance at
this page on the Minecraft wiki: https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Wandering_Trader#Spawning
